subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} minimally reconstructs *''winʔ'' ~ *''junʔ'', and suggests a possible relationship to {{cog|my|ယုံ||to believe}}; if so, from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*yum||to believe}}. Other cognates are {{cog|csh|yón-é}}, {{cog|mrh|zó}}, {{cog|lhu|ʑo³¹}}. 

{{och-l|[[信]]}} (minimally reconstructed *''sin(s)'') is a possible derivative.
